extension.name: JEmail Config Verifier (JCV)
extension.author: Team Ready Bytes
extension.description:
Test and verify your email configuration settings. Follow these steps to use this plugin :-
1) Go to Global Configuration.
2) Now, select Server tab. Here you will get Test Email button.
3) Set email configuration and click on Test Email button.
4) IMP: You do not need to save global configuration again and again. Just set the values and click on button. It will test your settings with-in few seconds.
